meanings.definition: The systematic investigation into and study of materials and sources in order to establish facts and reach new conclusions.
meanings.sent1: I did some research on dinosaurs for my school project.
meanings.sent2: Scientists conduct research to learn more about the universe.
meanings.sent3: My cat did some research on how to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her research into ancient civilizations uncovered hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The research on climate change was eye-opening.
